description:
Anisphia and Euphyllia have successfully completed their lecture before the Ministry of the Arcane. During the banquet held afterward, the alarm at Anisphia`s villa sounds. Anisphia and Euphyllia rush back to the villa, but the sight awaiting them there is a heartbreaking one...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaibutsu to Bongu no Mahou Teigi
La définition par la magie du monstre et du commun des mortels
The Magic Definition of the Monster and the Commoner
怪物と凡愚の魔法定義
